16-year-old.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

nasal fracture.context: Operation: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

deviated nasal septum.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

obstruction.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

nasal septoplasty.context: Operation: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

open reduction.context: Operation: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

left nasal obstruction.context: History: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball. He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

depressed left nasal bone.context: History: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball. He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

Betadine soap and solution.context: The face was prepped with Betadine soap and solution and draped in a sterile fashion.

Afrin pledgets.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

1% Xylocaine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

1:100,000 epinephrine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

cartilaginous septum lying crosswise.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

obstruction of the left nasal valve.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

cartilaginous septum displaced to the le.context: Further up, the cartilaginous septum was displaced to the left of the maxillary crest.

large maxillary crest.context: There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

vomer bone touching the inferior turbina.context: There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

large deep groove horizontally on the ri.context: There was a large deep groove horizontally on the right side corresponding to the left maxillary crest.

left hemitransfixion incision.context: A left hemitransfixion incision was made.

mucoperichondrium was elevated.context: Mucoperichondrium was elevated from left side of the cartilaginous septum and mucoperiosteum was elevated from the ethmoid plate.

vomer and inferior tunnel was created.context: Vomer and inferior tunnel was created at the floor of the left side of the nose to connect the anterior and inferior tunnels, which was rather difficult at the area of the vomerine spur, which was very sharp and touching the inferior turbinate.

vomerine spur.context: Vomer and inferior tunnel was created at the floor of the left side of the nose to connect the anterior and inferior tunnels, which was rather difficult at the area of the vomerine spur, which was very sharp and touching the inferior turbinate.

caudal cartilaginous septum was separate.context: The caudal cartilaginous septum, which was lying crosswise, was separated from the main cartilage leaving approximately 1 cm strut.

caudal cartilaginous strut was sutured.context: The caudal cartilaginous strut was sutured to the columella with interrupted #4-0 chromic catgut suture to bring it into the midline.

right side mucoperichondrium was release.context: The right side mucoperichondrium was released from the cartilaginous septum as well as ethmoid plate and the maxillary crest area.

cartilaginous septum was sutured in the.context: The caudal cartilaginous septum anterior to the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side, so it was freed from the maxillary crest, nasal dorsum, from the ethmoid plate, and was sutured in the midline with a transfixion #4-0 plain catgut sutures.

ethmoid plate was deviated to the left.context: Further posteriorly, the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side and portion of it was removed with Jansen-Middleton punch forceps.

portion of ethmoid plate was removed.context: Further posteriorly, the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side and portion of it was removed with Jansen-Middleton punch forceps.

maxillary crest was removed.context: This area was freed from the perichondrium on both sides. The maxillary crest was removed with a gouge.

vomer was partially removed.context: This area was freed from the perichondrium on both sides. The maxillary crest was removed with a gouge. Vomer was partially removed with a gouge and the rest of the vomer was displaced back into the midline.

vomer was displaced back into the midlin.context: This area was freed from the perichondrium on both sides. The maxillary crest was removed with a gouge. Vomer was partially removed with a gouge and the rest of the vomer was displaced back into the midline.

deviated septum was corrected.context: Thus, the deviated septum was corrected.

left hemitransfixion incisions were clos.context: Left hemitransfixion incisions were closed with interrupted #4-0 chromic catgut sutures.

septum was filtered.context: The septum was also filtered with #4-0 plain catgut sutures.

septal splints were tied.context: By valve, septal splints were tied to the septum bilaterally with a transfixion #5-0 nylon suture.

nasal bone suture deviated to the left.context: The nasal bones were refractured back into the midline by compressing the left nasal bone and elevating the right nasal bone with the nasal bone elevator through the nasal cavities.

nasal bones were refractured.context: The nasal bones were refractured back into the midline by compressing the left nasal bone and elevating the right nasal bone with the nasal bone elevator through the nasal cavities.

nasal bone elevator.context: The nasal bones were refractured back into the midline by compressing the left nasal bone and elevating the right nasal bone with the nasal bone elevator through the nasal cavities.

Steri-Strips were applied.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

Denver type of splint.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

nasal cavities were packed.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

Telfa gauze.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

bacitracin ointment.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

approximate blood loss.context: Approximate blood loss was 10 to 20 mL.
